reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Recovery and improvement of livelhood of pastoralist communities in Hobyo District, Galmudug
Verbesserung der ökonomischen Situation von Pastoralisten

description.narrative: Das Vorhaben unterstützt Pastoralisten und Aussteiger, ihre Lebensgrundlage zu bewahren und ihre Grundbedürfnisse nach den Überflutungen zu decken. Pastoralisten werden unterstützt, ihre Herdenhaltung an den sich verändernden, ökologischen Zyklus anzupassen, für Aussteiger werden alternative Lebensgrundlagen angeboten und die Rolle von Frauen in der pastoralistischen Ökonomie wird gestärkt.

The project supports pastoralists and drop-out pastoralists to sustain their livelihood and to cover their basic needs after the heavy flooding. Pastoralist will be supported to adopt their mode of production to the changes in the ecological cycle, drop outs to establish alternative livelihoods, and women to strengthen their role in the pastoralist economy.

The project supports pastoralists and drop-out pastoralists to sustain their livelihood and to cover their basic needs after the heavy flooding. Pastoralist will be supported to adopt their mode of production to the changes in the ecological cycle, drop outs to establish alternative livelihoods, and women to strengthen their role in the pastoralist economy.
